forum.content:
I'm not a fan of Burger King. In fact I can't even remember when was the last time I had a Whopper Junior.

Yet this news caught my eyes right out of nowhere. "Have a black burger and get your poo dyed in green." It's confirmed that they're using green food dye within safe limit. Simply for the fun if you wish to see something weird at your own toilet bowl during Halloween. Go ahead and dig this black Whooper. (if it exists here in Taiwan)

urls.description: Black burger goes in. Green poop comes out?
urls.title: Why the black Whopper turns your poop green

forum.title: 「Fun Stuff」Halloween burger
